short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and minimal extension that allows you to get the hex code of any pixel on your screen even outside of your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you ever need to pick color from any website, Min eye-Dropper is here to help.

Min eye Dropper is open source extension which allows you to pick colors from any pixel of any web pages and even outside your browser.
Min eye Dropper is extension for Google Chrome and Chromium. It is great tool for web developers.


HOME PAGE
==========

All info about Eye Dropper is available on :
https://touzand.github.io/eye-dropper-client
